sections.title: Watch the Heat
sections.content: Pavement gets hot quickly. Walk early in the morning during summer.

sections.title: Leash Laws
sections.content: Most parks require leashes, but there are designated off-leash areas.

living_with_dogs_here.summary: Austin is one of the most dog-friendly cities in the US, but the heat can be tough on some breeds.
living_with_dogs_here.dog_friendly_score_explained: Based on parks, vets, and services.
